title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The preview is cut off when changing a parameter name to something very long.
EB: The preview should display the full parameter name even if it is very long.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Navigate to the first page.
3. Enter a parameter name that is very long.
4. Verify if the preview displays the full parameter name.
